oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Oakley Jennings oral history
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Jennings, Oakley
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Excerpt of an oral history with Oakley Jennings, a veteran who attended Middle Tennessee State College on the GI Bill after World War II and chemistry/physics professor at the university. Jennings shares his memories of campus life as a nontraditional student during the 1940s
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Campus life; GI Bill
College students; Male college students; Veterans--Education; World War, 1939-1945; Middle Tennessee State Teachers College; Middle Tennessee State College
